website_summaries.verdict: Classic Blundstone men's  Chelsea boot with extra cushioned insoles. High-performing casual footwear.
pros: Gets better with age and offers great comfort and ease

customer_reviews.title: Unlike my other Blunnies, these were very tight, require break in time.
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of Blundstones (500) that were comfortable from day one. These, however, require some breaking in. They are very tight, especially across the top of my insole. Couldn't wear them for more than a couple of hours at first (the circulation was being cut off in my feet!) and almost sent them back. Slowly they are stretching out. Perhaps ordering up a size would solve that problem, but the length is correct, so...
customer_reviews.author: Kate R.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Use inserts though!
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots. Leather is softer than the other typical Blundstone’a. I keep getting compliments on them. They don’t have any arch support and are generally really flat inside but I wear inserts so that is ok with me. Before I had inserts they were just too flat for my feet. I’m not sure what the big difference is between the Original vs the Classics but they Classics I guess are supposed to have more cushion. They could use a bit more cushion in general but I love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my PERFECT boots.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get my wide foot in at first. Wearing them warms up the leather to mss as me it more maleable/flexible. I LOVE THESE BOOTS. My feet never get tired wearing them. I love how they look. I can’t wait to wear them all day, every day. Great ankle support, comfortable not tight anywhere. ♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Ann L. Neftin

customer_reviews.title: Too tight across the top
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d returned these instead of trying to let them stretch and shape to my feet. This boot just isn’t for my foot. I have a higher arch and this boot isn’t tall enough across the arch of my foot. If I’m sitting for too long the nerves on top of my foot are compressed by the boot causing intense pain and residual numbness from the damage done while the boot is on. They include an insert for “thin” feet, but nothing for thick (?) feet.
customer_reviews.author: AimeeM

customer_reviews.title: Same old, same great shoes my feet has grown to love
customer_reviews.text: It’s the same Blundstone 550s I’ve been wearing for almost 20 years now. This is my 5th pair. They feel just like the pair I took off my feet (a bit tighter of course at first, until the leather loosens up) I was worried when the production moved to Vietnam, but it is the same shoe as it was before. Their quality control does not seem to have suffered with the move.
customer_reviews.author: Argun Tekant

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable ever!
customer_reviews.text: My Blundstone Men's 587 Round Toe Chelsea Boot is the most comfortable and best fitting footwear I have ever purchased. It easily slips on without a shoehorn because of the handy loops which add to the shoes iconic look. I have a wide foot and usually have to stretch the toe box but my Blundstone fits perfectly. I went on a 3 mile walk the first day with no issues. The quality is excellent and the finish will only get better as they age and are scuffed up. I have ordered a woman's pair for a close friend.
customer_reviews.author: LBLJR

customer_reviews.title: Not as awesome as I expected
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I don’t love these as much as I thought I would. The arch support isn’t awesome and when you switch out the foot bed to improve the arch support the boot becomes a bit tight on the top of your foot. I thought these would be my go to travel, walking boots but they’re not great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Falk

customer_reviews.title: Best Boot Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I’ve ever bought. Strong. Very comfortable even working on cement surfaces. I’m broad foot and these are totally fine. Little toe isn’t pushing through the side of the shoe as with other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 a size up
customer_reviews.text: These boots came just as expected. If you want a little more room I suggest going 1/2 a size up. But they’re pretty accurate sizing! Delivered 2 days before expected.:)
customer_reviews.author: Sjohnson

customer_reviews.title: I get constant compliments and love them so much
customer_reviews.text: These boots took a few wears to break in, but now that they have I am obsessed! I get constant compliments and love them so much. 4 stars because they were so painful to break in for the back of my heel
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable. It’s a bit challenging to get my foot into Once on it it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots. Fit is true to size. I am a size 10 D in all my shoes. These fit perfectly. We’ll see how they hold up quality- wise but they are beautiful boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lefko

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable boots! I stand 10-12 hours in then and my feet don’t hurt at the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: jpnas1o19

customer_reviews.title: and i love it, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: aloha, thats my second blundstone (round toe 587),and i love it,super comfortable, i used at work for 8 hours and was great. 5 stars,i will buy another one. comfortable and support and high quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia and Luiz Marques

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to choose a size is difficult. Lots and lots of research.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a US 8.5, but this shoe was definitely too small for my foot in the front. Great quality shoe, but also was not a fan of the Rustic Black color.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tarantini

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing and returning nearly (5) varied pair of Blundstones, I am going to stick with this pair. The extra cushioned insoles really help those of us with smaller feet. Just wear with thicker socks. The shoes are very comfortable, I got them to wear on vacation in UK over the holidays. Better than bringing full length boots.
customer_reviews.author: pr

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit of these boots and can’t recommend them ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of blunnies. I love the fit of these boots and can’t recommend them enough. Stylish and comfortable, you can’t go wrong with blunnies. Side note. Sizing can be a little tricky. I wear a size 8.5 US women’s and I ordered a 5.5 AU and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: fearofbroca

customer_reviews.title: Be proud to own a pair, folks will come.
customer_reviews.text: Boots are epic. Going on 10 years with them..... need to wear to appreaite the blunnys.
customer_reviews.author: Julien Begien

customer_reviews.title: I own these in the womens version and found they are true to size as well and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend wears an 11 US, occasionally 10.5 if a brand runs large. He ordered the US 11/UK 10 in these and they fit him perfectly. If you are between sizes, pick the larger size. The back part can sort of rub into your ankle at first but they break in quickly. I own these in the womens version and found they are true to size as well and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny from the block

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am women's size 9-9.5. Ordered a 9 and they were too small
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really perfect. Got them for wintertime in Colorado and they keep my feet warm and dry. I have a narrow foot and they fit me with a little room tor a couple of pairs of socks if I want.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Difficult sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep, so I have some problems with this boot. It is snug in the front and loose in the heel. They give an additional insert that snugs the heel but makes the toe box too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence J Strondak

customer_reviews.title: THEY STRECH
customer_reviews.text: mine hurt my feet now they are my favorite shoes :) I got an 9.5 AS and I usually wear mens 10.5 US
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great daily drivers.
customer_reviews.text: On my 2nd pair. Comfortable in office and with good support for multi surface field work.
customer_reviews.author: Samuelon

customer_reviews.title: Love my Blundstones!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I am not looking forward to about summer is that I will not be wearing my Blundstones everyday! I LOVE THEM and get compliments every time that I wear them. I will be purchasing several more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: northcb

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: These run very small. Amazon will not honor the price for 1/2 size bigger. Do not buy unless you are absolutely sure they fit. Also not sure why Amazon has such widely different prices for other sizes.Getting a new pair for 1/2 size bigger would have cost me $50 more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Guerra

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and so durable
customer_reviews.text: Wear them everyday. So comfortable and so durable! Had to use the insoles the come with as they were a bit loose at first but other than that they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did because I ended up ordering a size ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a different style Blundstone in a store first. I'm glad I did because I ended up ordering a size smaller than I usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: E. Geli

product_meta.title: Blundstone Men's 587 Round Toe Chelsea Boot
product_meta.description: Take the Blundstone® 587 to work, then enjoy them the rest of the day! Premium tanned leather upper. Twin-needle reinforced stitching with a high tensile strength thread. Sturdy front and back pull-on tabs. Elastic gore retains its shape. Full leather lining. Removable Comfort EVA footbed with PORON® XRD™ in the heel pad. Features PORON® XRD™ in the heel strike zone to dissipate heel strike shock. Polyutherane midsole for comfort and shock absorption. Thermo urethane outsole is resistant to hydrolysis and microbial attack. TPU outsole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 1⁄4 in Weight: 1 lb 3 oz Circumference: 10 1⁄4 in Shaft: 6 in Platform Height: 3⁄4 in Product measurements were taken using size AU 10 (US Men's 11), width Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
